code: export default function isSelectionValid(){var selection=window.getSelection();var string=selection.toString();var anchorNode=selection.anchorNode;var focusNode=selection.focusNode;var isTextNode=anchorNode&&anchorNode.nodeType===window.Node.TEXT_NODE||focusNode&&focusNode.nodeType===window.Node.TEXT_NODE;return string.length>=1&&string!=='\n'&&isTextNode;}
